Name: medulloblastoma
Definition: An infratentorial cancer that is located_in the lower part of the brain and is a type of primitive neuroectodermal tumor.

Name: brain stem cancer
Definition: A brain stem cancer that is characterized by mass lesion of the brainstem

Name: cerebellum cancer
Definition: A brain stem cancer that is characterized by mass lesion of the brainstem

Name: cervicomedullary junction neoplasm
Definition: A brain cancer that is located_in the infratentorial region.

Name: pediatric infratentorial ependymoma
Definition: An immune system disease that is located_in the lymphatic system.
Synonym: acute peptic ulcer without hemorrhage and without perforation
